title: Sherlock Holmes: His Last Bow - BBC Radio - Set 5 - SeymourDAC
description:
His Last Bow by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle. (published 1917)

Dramatised for radio by Bert Coules et al. Starring Clive Merrison as Sherlock Holmes & Michael Williams as Doctor John Watson.

Eight stories, each lasting 45 minutes. Total running time approximately 6 hours.

Wisteria Lodge

The Cardboard Box

The Red Circle

The Bruce Partington Plans

The Dying Dectective

The Disapperance of Lady Frances Carfax

The Devil&#039;s Foot

His Last Bow.

My recordings from BBC7 at 160kbps CBR joint-stereo mp3, encoded with LAME.
Recorded from Freeview -> DVD Recorder -> MP3.

Have fun & please seed.

SeymourDAC

:)
